abstract: The surprise announcement signaled BP’s deepening involvement in Russia’s turbulent energy sector.
snippet: The surprise announcement signaled BP’s deepening involvement in Russia’s turbulent energy sector.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, March 23  BP said on Friday that it planned to bid against the state-owned oil giant Rosneft in a bankruptcy auction for assets of the Yukos oil company, a surprise announcement that signaled BP’s deepening involvement in Russia’s turbulent energy sector.

headline.main: BP Plans to Bid for Yukos Assets in Auction
headline.print_headline: BP Plans to Bid for Yukos Assets in Auction
